item.title: Cloud Functions Simple(st) HTTP Proxy
item.description: I’m investigating the use of LetsEncrypt for gRPC services. I found this straightforward post by Scott Devoid and am going to try this approach. Before I can do that, I need to be able to publish services (make the Internet-accessible) and would like to try to continue to use GCP for free. Some time ago, I wrote about using the excellent Microk8s on GCP. Using an f1-micro, I’m hoping (!
